title: Exec user playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Exec user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts playback of a Live game
AND the user attempts playback of an Archive game
AND the user attempts playback of VOD content
AND the user attempts playback of SVOD content
AND the user attempts playback of MLBN 24/7 linear feed
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to successfully playback a Live game
AND the user is able to successfully playback an Archive game
AND the user is able to successfully playback VOD content
AND the user is able to successfully playback SVOD content
AND the user is able to successfully playback the MLBN 24/7 linear feed

title: Log In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is not already logged in
AND a user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN a subscribers email address is entered in the "Email Address" field
AND the associated password is entered in the "Password" field
AND the user selects the "Log In" button
custom_expected: THEN the user is successfully logged in

title: Log Out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is already logged in
AND a user is on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the "Log Out" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is successfully logged out
AND the "Log Out" button has changed to the "Log In" button

title: Live Game Playback - Watch Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that is entitled for Live game playback is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a Live game for playback
AND the user selects a feed button
AND the user selects the "Watch Live" button in the secondary Feed Select modal
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the Live game playing back at the live point

title: Live Game Playback - Resume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
AND the user has selected a Live game for playback 
AND the user has exited a Live game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the same game for playback
AND selects the same feed
AND selects the "Resume" button in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected: THEN playback resumes at the bookmarked time

title: Live Game Playback - Start from the Beginning
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that is entitled for Live game playback is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a Live game for playback
AND the user selects a feed button
AND the user selects the "Start from the Beginning" button in the secondary Feed Select modal
custom_expected:
THEN the user sees the Live game playing back from the beginning

**NOTE:** If the game is already in progress, the beginning will be right before the 1st inning. If the game is not in progress, the beginning will be at the beginning of the stream

title: Archive Game Playback - No Bookmarks
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a previously unwatched archive game for playback
AND selects a feed
custom_expected: THEN playback starts at the beginning of the stream

title: Archive Game Playback - Resume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
AND the user has initiated archive game playback
AND has exited archived game playback
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects the previously watched archive game for playback
AND selects the previously watched feed
AND selects the "Resume" button in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected: THEN playback starts at the booked marked time

title: Archive Game Playback - Start from the Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
AND the user has initiated archive game playback
AND has exited archived game playback
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects the previously watched archive game for playback
AND selects the previously watched feed
AND selects the "Start from the Beginning" button in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected: THEN playback starts at the beginning of the feed

title: VOD Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user is entitled for VOD content playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a VOD content tile for playback from the Home page

**NOTE:** VOD content carousels: "MLB Most Popular", "Get Caught Up", "Condensed Games", "Recaps", "<favorite_team> Most Popular"
custom_expected: THEN the VOD content plays back from the beginning of the video

title: SVOD Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user is entitled for SVOD content playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a SVOD content tile for playback from the Home page

**NOTE:** SVOD content carousels: "MLB.TV Original Shows", "MLB Network Presents"
custom_expected: THEN the SVOD content plays back from the beginning of the video

title: FLIVE Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user is entitled for FLIVE content playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a FLIVE content tile for playback from the Home page
custom_expected: THEN the FLIVE content plays back from the live point

title: SLIVE Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user is entitled for SLIVE content playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a SLIVE content tile for playback from the Home page

**NOTE:** SLIVE content example: "Big Inning"
custom_expected: THEN the SLIVE content plays back from the live point

title: MLBN Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user is entitled for MLBN 24/7 feed playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLBN Live content for playback from the Home page
custom_expected: THEN the MLBN 24/7 feed plays back from the live point

title: Game Player Controls
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has initiated playback for a live or archive game
custom_steps: WHEN the user initiates pause, fast forward, rewind, or play using the remote/controller
custom_expected: THEN the stream reacts appropriately to the actions initiated

title: Forge Player Controls
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has initiated playback of VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE content
custom_steps: WHEN the user initiates pause, fast forward, rewind, or play using the remote/controller
custom_expected: THEN the stream reacts appropriately to the actions initiated

title: Playback from Hero - Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a live game is present in the Hero
AND a user entitled for live game playback is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Watch Live" button in the hero

**NOTE:** If Hide Spoilers is ON, the button should say "Watch Now"
custom_expected:
THEN the game starts playback at the live point

**NOTE:** If Hide Spoilers is ON, playback will start at the beginning

title: Playback from Hero - Non-Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE is present in the Hero
AND a user entitled for playback is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Watch Now" button in the hero
custom_expected:
THEN FLIVE/SLIVE starts playback at the live point
AND VOD/SVOD starts playback at the beginning

title: Playback from Games carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game is live
AND a user is logged in
AND entitled for game playback
AND the user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a live game for playback from the Games carousel

**NOTE:** The "Games" Carousel can also be called "Today's Lineup"
custom_expected: THEN the game plays back successfully

title: Playback from Games page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game is live or archive
AND a user is logged in
AND entitled for game playback
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a live or archive game for playback
custom_expected: THEN the game plays back successfully

title: Date navigation using Games page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "<" or ">" buttons
OR the user selects the "Today" button
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate day with the appropriate games are displayed

title: Date navigation using Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Games page
AND the user has selected the calendar button

**NOTE:** The calendar button is above the top-right game tile, to the right of the [>] right arrow button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "<" or ">" buttons
AND selects a day in the month that has games
OR the user selects the "Today" button
custom_expected:
THEN the appropriate month is displayed as the user presses the "<" or ">" buttons
AND the appropriate day with the appropriate games are displayed on the games page after the user selects a day

title: Entitlements - MLBALL
custom_preconds: GIVEN the logged in user has MLBALL, SUBSCRIBERVOD, MiLBALL, MLBN entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any entitled content for playback

**NOTE: Excluded Live Content**
MVPD - ASG and Postseason
Partner - AppleTV+, Peacock
Blackouts - In-market games, ESPN Sunday Night Baseball
custom_expected: THEN the user receives successful playback of content

title: Entitlements - STP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the logged in user has MLBTV_STP_<team_tri_code> and SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlements

**NOTE:** Single Team subscribers have the following entitlements: MLBTV_STP_<team_tri_code>, MLBAUDIO, SUBSCRIBERVOD, IPHONEATBATBAT, ANDROIDATBAT, MiLBALL, MLBN
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any entitled content for playback

**NOTE: Excluded Live Content**
MVPD - ASG and Postseason
Partner - AppleTV+, Peacock
Blackouts - In-market games, ESPN Sunday Night Baseball
Games that do not involve the subscribed team
custom_expected: THEN the user receives successful playback of entitled content

title: Entitlements - Free
custom_preconds: GIVEN the logged in user is a Free user with no entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any VOD, FLIVE, or out-of-market Free Game of the Day
OR the user selects any SVOD, SLIVE, or non-Free Game of the Day
custom_expected:
THEN the successfully receives playback for the VOD, FLIVE, or out-of-market Free Game of the Day
OR the user cannot playback any SVOD, SLIVE, or non-Free Game of the Day

title: Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds: GIVEN Hide Spoilers on the Settings page is set to ON
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views game tiles
OR the user views a game in the hero spot
custom_expected:
THEN score, inning, balls/strikes, bases, pitcher, or batter information is not displaying in the game tile or the Hero spot
AND "Hide Spoilers is ON" is displayed in the game tile for archive games
OR "Pitcher Hidden" and "Batter Hidden" is displayed in the game tile for in-progress live games
OR "Probable Pitcher Hidden" is displayed in the game tile for scheduled games

title: Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds: GIVEN Hide Spoilers on the Settings page is set to OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views game tiles
OR the user views a game in the hero spot
custom_expected:
THEN score, inning, balls/strikes, bases, pitcher, batter, or any other game information is not displaying in the game tile or the Hero spot
AND W/L/S pitchers are displayed in the game tile for archive games
OR the current pitcher with stats and the current batter with stats is displayed in the game tile for in-progress live games
OR the scheduled probable pitchers are displayed in the game tile for scheduled games (Pitcher TBD if a probable pitcher has not been assigned)

title: Closed Captions ON
custom_preconds: GIVEN Closed Captions are set to OFF on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN a user sets Closed Captions to ON
custom_expected:
THEN closed captions are displayed during video playback
AND the CC button in the scrubber displays "CC Turn OFF" with focus

title: Closed Captions OFF
custom_preconds: GIVEN Closed Captions are set to ON on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN a user sets Closed Captions to OFF
custom_expected:
THEN closed captions do not display during video playback
AND the CC button in the scrubber displays "CC Turn ON" with focus

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Video Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not anonymous, a free user, or a single team subscriber
AND the user is entitled to archive or live game playback
AND the user has initiated playback for an archive or live game that has home and away feeds
custom_steps:
WHEN the user displays the scrubber
AND assigns focus to "Broadcast Options"
AND navigates to the video feed button that is not blue
AND presses the select button
custom_expected:
THEN the newly selected video feed starts playing back
AND audio playback is updated to the TV audio of the newly selected video feed
AND the scrubber is dismissed after 10 seconds

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Alt Audio
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive or live game playback
AND the selected archive or live game has alt audio feeds
AND the user selects a video feed to initiate playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options in the scrubber
AND the user selects an alt audio feed
custom_expected:
THEN video playback continues
AND the alt audio feed is playing back
AND the alt audio is in-sync with the video
